Promote the book given its description.
This horror novel follows a group of childhood friends brought together through a terrifying game of hide-and-seek as moonlit shadows reach deep into the night.

Dive into the spine-chilling world of suspense and fear with this gripping horror novel that will keep you on the edge of your seat! Join a group of childhood friends who are unexpectedly reunited through a sinister game of hide-and-seek, where moonlit shadows stretch ominously into the night, revealing secrets and horrors beyond imagination. As the darkness closes in, their unbreakable bond is tested in unimaginable ways. Will they outsmart the lurking terrors, or will the shadows claim them one by one? Perfect for fans of thrilling narratives and nail-biting suspense, this novel is a must-read for anyone who loves to be captivated by the supernatural and the unknown. Uncover the mystery and face your fears—if you dare!
